title: feat: comprehensive improvements and automated versioning
body:
This PR includes:

## 🚀 Major Improvements
- ✅ **Automated Semantic Versioning**: Conventional commits trigger automatic version bumps
- ✅ **Enhanced CI/CD Pipeline**: Automated testing, building, and publishing to crates.io
- ✅ **Improved Test Coverage**: Fixed all compilation errors, 245+ tests passing
- ✅ **New Cowboy Banner**: Updated project branding with watermark-free image

## 📋 Changes Included
- **Version Management**: Automated version bumping based on commit types
- **GitHub Actions**: Enhanced release workflow with conventional commit analysis
- **Developer Tools**: Added commit.sh helper script for standardized commits
- **Documentation**: Updated README and added CONVENTIONAL_COMMITS.md guide
- **Banner Update**: Replaced old banner with new cowboy-themed image
- **Test Suite**: Comprehensive test coverage improvements

## 🔄 Automated Process
When merged to main:
1. ✅ Commits analyzed for version bump type
2. ✅ Cargo.toml version automatically updated
3. ✅ Git tag created (e.g., v0.5.0)
4. ✅ GitHub release generated
5. ✅ Package published to crates.io

## 🎯 Ready for Production
- All tests passing (245+)
- Code formatted and linted
- Automated release pipeline configured
- Conventional commit standards implemented

**BREAKING CHANGE**: Introduces automated versioning system

title: 🚀 Release v0.3.0: Major Bevy Rewrite with Enhanced Analysis & Documen…
body:
…tation

✨ Major Features:
• Complete UI rewrite with modern Bevy-based TUI framework • Advanced GPU acceleration (Metal/CUDA/MKL) with auto-detection • Enhanced rule-based analysis with 100+ security/performance patterns • Multi-language vulnerability detection (Rust, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript) • Real-time progress tracking with file-by-file analysis updates

📚 Documentation Overhaul:
• Comprehensive README with actual terminal output examples • Real command demonstrations for all 4 output formats • Include/exclude pattern examples with actual issue counts • Advanced CI/CD integration guides with jq examples • Complete format comparison table and usage guidance

🔧 Technical Improvements:
• Streamlined architecture with zero dead code warnings • Robust error handling with graceful GPU fallback • Clean separation of analysis engine and UI components • Optimized performance with async processing pipeline • Foundation for future AI re-integration when ready

🐛 Fixes:
• Resolved token sampling issues with rule-based fallback • Fixed GPU compilation and runtime detection
• Eliminated user confusion with accurate documentation • Memory efficiency improvements and clean code organization

Breaking Changes:
• Migrated from basic TUI to Bevy framework
• New widget-based UI architecture
• Updated command structure with enhanced options

title: Update dependencies and run security audit
body:
- Updated 4 dependencies to latest compatible versions
- Ran cargo audit to identify security vulnerabilities
- Found 1 medium-severity vulnerability in transitive dependency 'time' crate
- Found 1 warning for unmaintained 'paste' crate
- Both issues stem from kalosm AI library dependencies
- No direct fixes available without replacing kalosm dependency
